TEXT.TITLE: OXFORD FINANCIAL BUYS CLANCY SYSTEMS
TEXT.BODY: <Oxford Financial Inc> said it acquired <Clancy Systems International Inc> for an undisclosed sum. The company said Clancy has developed a fully automated parking citation system, currently in use in Oklahoma City, the University of California at Sacramento, and in a pilot program in San Francisco. Reuter
